content.text: Bimine is the mayor of "gourmet town", Pucci. He was first mentioned when the town Pucci was brought up by Iceburg. He was mentioned again when his daughter Marumieta was brought up.
Bimine is a portly man with wavy, neck-length, light-colored hair and a mustache. He wears a light-colored suit with a dark undershirt, a bow-tie, and a tall dark hat with his name on it.

images.caption: Bimine in the digitally colored manga.

content.text: Little is known about Bimine’s personality, but he cares greatly for his daughter and most likely has leader-like qualities, being the mayor of Pucci.
Bimine has never been shown fighting, but as a mayor it can be assumed he is proficient at running the city.

sections.title: From the Decks of the World

content.text: After the timeskip, Bimine became a client of the Galley-La Company.

elements.text: ↑  One Piece Manga — Vol. 67 Chapter 657, Bimine becomes a client of the Galley-La Company.
↑  One Piece Manga and Anime — Vol. 34 Chapter 326 and Episode 231, Bimine is first mentioned when Pucci is brought up.
↑  One Piece Manga — Vol. 67 Chapter 657, Bimine's name is romanized.
